Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: cassy quillin
Reviews.Content: I got the pink one for my daughter and it was a great value for its price.  She can take all the pictures she wants now and can leave mine alone, Yay!!

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made and poor photos
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: It's cheaply made, and puts out pictures with resolution below a disposable camera. Don't bother with this camera. Save your money!

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: julie lindamood
Reviews.Content: If you think you are finding a little Gem, you are not!!  Very useless and disappointing to the child. Save your money

Reviews.Title: cheap, but not cheap enough
Reviews.Author: wmuxor
Reviews.Content: It takes lousy pictures, the video quality is lousy, the sound is lousy.  If this is supposed to be a toy, it's still cheap, but costs too much for what it is.  It's good enough to find at a thrift store for a couple dollars.

Reviews.Title: exceptionally poor quality
Reviews.Author: June
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this to any buyer..........  poor quality  bought it for 2 kids who cannot use it at all.  its junk

Reviews.Title: Awfuld waste of money
Reviews.Author: Melissa Brown
Reviews.Content: bought three for my boys who are dying to have their own first cameras. Couldn't download pictures and wasn't even sure it took any pictures. Was not worth the money or time.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my Grandkids
Reviews.Author: Lisa Malkewicz
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera.  Rated it low because you can't see the picture when you are taking movies. Otherwise, easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk :o(
Reviews.Author: Mackenzie's mommy
Reviews.Content: So disappointed with this camera. But - you get what you pay for. I got mine on nomorerack dot com for nine dollars.

ProductInfo.Features:
PC camera with still picture and video modes.
Includes software disc, USB cable, lanyard, manufacturer warranty, and instruction booklet.
Holds up to 274 photos
JPEG/AVI Format
Two image resolution options.
ProductInfo.Name: Digitac Jazz Kids Digital Camera , Color May Very
